title: The matchmaking system is BROKEN
body:
so i was playing jax because sometimes i just have to solo baron

And I got matched with a kayle that not only didnt defend her tower... she didnt even have a keystone mastery he was probably playing for like a day at this point so I don't know how the hell could have i gotten matched with this player 

it just seems to prove my matchmaking system theory

replies.body: SO how is that related to matchmaking? Did u forget to mention how u played NORMAL game? Reason u got matched with him was because he was premade with Sion, Kogmaw and Zyra.
The person really made a matchmaking complaint about normals? oh lord.
yes i wont play much ranked because i fear that i will get another of these 1/12 inter premades
so how are you supposed to balance a team which has players ranging for challenger to below level 10?

Matchmaking is totally flawed, or even rigged.
Look how many balanced games are there in everyone's match history, at least below Diamond :D

AHHHHHHHH YES. GOOD OLD FASHIONED MATCHMAKING. I KNOW IT ALL TOO WELL. EXPLAIN THIS RIOT. Bronze-Silver match.

https://ibb.co/j8bfbv
